entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:20 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Overcast. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
